stone.io

Class IOHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • stone.io.IOHandler

  • public class IOHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class handling I/O-Operations
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IOHandler(StartupContainer sc)
      Creates a new IO-Handler
      IOHandler(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new temporarily IOHandler to present a GUI as fast as possible

                        int offset,
                        int length)

        bytes - buffer to read from
        offset - first byte in buffer to write
        length - bytes to write
